title: Welcoming Party
text: Join us as we welcome incoming SFU and FIC students!

title: SFUIA Olympics 2022
text: The biggest SFUIA event of the year where we have basketball and futsal sport competitions.
place: SFU Burnaby East and Central Gym

title: SFUIA Halloween Party
text: Prepare your tricks or treats, and to the terrifying yet funniest time of the year: our upcoming Halloween Party! Horribly awesome prizes and so much fun awaits you.
place: Brookmere Party Room at Brookmere Apartment

title: SFUIA Olympics 2023
text: Shoot for the hoop or strike the ball! Join us in SFUIA's annual thrilling basketball and futsal competition
